vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.49;
son of: Sheva (H7724);
brother of: Machbenah (H4343)
§ Gibea = "hill"
son of Sheva and grandson of Caleb (a son of Caleb)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
基比亞 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "小山"
迦勒的兒子 (代上2:49)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
基比亚 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "小山"
迦勒的儿子 (代上2:49)
